Curator's comments: On fishing in ancient Egypt, see I. Gammer-wallert, Fische und Fischkult im alten Ägypten (Berlin, 1970). D. J. Brewer and R. F. Friedman, Fish and fishing in ancient Egypt (Warminster, 1989). Fish hooks are found at many settlement sites throughout ancient Egyptian history: see http://www.digitalegypt.ucl.ac.uk/tools/fishing.html (including examples from New Kingdom Gurob)
Acquisition name: Donated by: Dr W L Hildburgh
